tasks.task: Farming and Chickens in Matsui, British Columbia
subtasks: Work 5 hours daily on the chicken farm
Work 1-2 hours daily on the blueberry farm during season
Prune trees in winter for blueberry farm
Manage a breeder farm with hens and roosters
Produce hatchable eggs for meat chickens
Face rising costs including mortgages and feed
Ensure livestock performance under high pressure
Manage farm operations 7 days a week
Manage blueberry crop loss due to extreme heat
Volunteer in community flood relief efforts
Address low insurance coverage in agricultural disasters
